h1. Usage

h2. POM configuration

{code:xml|title=Dependency}

    <dependency>
          <groupId>org.bsc.processor</groupId>
          <artifactId>resource-processor</artifactId>
          <version>1.0</version>
          <type>jar</type>
    </dependency>

{code}


(i) To use this processor we have to use [maven processor plugin|http://code.google.com/p/maven-annotation-plugin/]

{code:xml|title=processor plugin}

    </plugin>
        <plugin>
          <groupId>org.bsc.maven</groupId>
          <artifactId>maven-processor-plugin</artifactId>
          <version>1.2-SNAPSHOT</version>
          <executions>
            <execution>
              <id>process</id>
              <goals>
                <goal>process</goal>
              </goals>
              <phase>generate-sources</phase>
              <configuration>
                 <outputDirectory>${basedir}/target/generated-sources/processor</outputDirectory>
                 <processors>
                 <!-- list of processors to use -->
                    <processor>org.bsc.processor.implementation.ResourceProcessorImpl</processor>
                </processors>
              </configuration>

            </execution>
          </executions>
        </plugin>

{code}

{code:xml|title=plugin repository}

<pluginRepositories>
    <pluginRepository>
      <id>maven-annotation-plugin</id>
      <url>http://maven-annotation-plugin.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/mavenrepo</url>
    </pluginRepository>
</pluginRepositories>

{code}

(!) Don't forget that this plugin doen't work without set target and source compiler output to 1.5 or greater

{code:xml|title=compiler plugin}

<groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
<artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
<configuration>
    <source>1.5</source>
    <target>1.5</target>

</configuration>

{code}
